content: Niner fans HATE Jed York. Really loathe him. His last name is often used as a synonym for various expletives on 49ers blogs. Mainly they hate him for firing Jim Harbaugh, but there’s also the out of touch rich a-hole type who inherited a football team persona he’s cultivated. But even with firing Jim Harbaugh and hiring Jim Tomsula I think the stadium is his most damning mistake. They might be able to hire another good coach, but they’re stuck with that stadium. It’s a total botch job, and everyone involved: Santa Clara, Niner Fans, and the Niners…is stuck with it for a long time. It’s like bad plastic surgery. It’s horrible, it can’t be fixed, and it’s just sad.
